subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: MacKinzie Kline, who was born with a congenital heart defect, will play in her first L.P.G.A. Tour event, the $2.6 million Ginn Tribute near Charleston, on Thursday.
snippet: MacKinzie Kline, who was born with a congenital heart defect, will play in her first L.P.G.A. Tour event, the $2.6 million Ginn Tribute near Charleston, on Thursday.
